Complications Occurring after Hospitalization
Although the assigned medical therapy was discontinued on the day of discharge, the incidence of atrial fibrillation was significantly lower in the amiodarone group than in the placebo group during the period immediately following discharge. The half-life of amiodarone is 13 to 103 days.36 It is likely that the lower incidence of atrial fibrillation after discharge in the amiodarone group is attributable to a persistent antiarrhythmic effect.
